Multi-functional desk: The desk can have built-in storage compartments, shelves, and drawers to maximize space and organization.
Adjustable desk: The desk can be adjusted to different heights to accommodate users of different ages and heights.
Desk with built-in lighting: The desk can have built-in LED lights to provide better illumination for tasks that require focus and concentration.
Desk with built-in charging station: The desk can have a built-in charging station for electronic devices, such as phones and laptops.
Desk with built-in air filtration system: The desk can have a built-in air filtration system to improve air quality and reduce allergens.
